Replying to @klarstrup 2019-11-27 08:20
@klarstrup @swyx Yeah, I like that combo. - Generate a view and URL of every page. - Progressively enhance with client-side rendering and APIs for content. In some cases that will be perfect. In others that will be over engineering. In others still, it might not be practical. But I like it.
